title: Repo sync
author: docs-bot
details: Restructured enterprise billing documentation: Added new files for Azure DevOps licenses and GHES license files, updated existing content to clarify licensing models (usage-based vs volume), and reorganized concepts.
Updated license synchronization documentation: Clarified automatic and manual sync processes, added setup steps, and linked to new license file concepts.
Updated GraphQL schema: Added upcoming breaking changes for `NotificationThread` fields by 2026-01-01.
Enhanced search analytics: Added logic to detect external API requests and enforce `client_name` parameter for analytics.
Synced secret scanning data: Updated validity checks for Sourcegraph tokens.
Fixed OpenAPI schema descriptions: Corrected ordering of `descriptionHTML` and `statusCodes` fields.
summary:
- Restructured enterprise billing documentation: Added new files for Azure DevOps licenses and GHES license files, updated existing content to clarify licensing models (usage-based vs volume), and reorganized concepts.
- Updated license synchronization documentation: Clarified automatic and manual sync processes, added setup steps, and linked to new license file concepts.
- Updated GraphQL schema: Added upcoming breaking changes for `NotificationThread` fields by 2026-01-01.
- Enhanced search analytics: Added logic to detect external API requests and enforce `client_name` parameter for analytics.
- Synced secret scanning data: Updated validity checks for Sourcegraph tokens.
- Fixed OpenAPI schema descriptions: Corrected ordering of `descriptionHTML` and `statusCodes` fields.

original_description:
This is an automated pull request to sync changes between the public and private repos.
Our bot will merge this pull request automatically.
To preserve continuity across repos, _do not squash_ this pull request.
raw_analysis:
### Summary
- Restructured enterprise billing documentation: Added new files for Azure DevOps licenses and GHES license files, updated existing content to clarify licensing models (usage-based vs volume), and reorganized concepts.
- Updated license synchronization documentation: Clarified automatic and manual sync processes, added setup steps, and linked to new license file concepts.
- Updated GraphQL schema: Added upcoming breaking changes for `NotificationThread` fields by 2026-01-01.
- Enhanced search analytics: Added logic to detect external API requests and enforce `client_name` parameter for analytics.
- Synced secret scanning data: Updated validity checks for Sourcegraph tokens.
- Fixed OpenAPI schema descriptions: Corrected ordering of `descriptionHTML` and `statusCodes` fields.

### Title
Restructure enterprise billing docs, update license sync, and enhance search analytics
